}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"45-403-000233" is silkscreened on the main board in the [https://fccid.io/I88WAP6806/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-3011311 FCC photos]. *"45-601-000512" is silkscreened on the 5GHz wireless module board. :OEM: [[MitraStar]], P/N: WAP6806-EU0101F Web GUI: http://zyxelsetup (Windows) or http://zyxelsetup.local (MAC)
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== {{/Serial info}}
